archimate:Location.name: Capacity Market Area
archimate:Location.documentation:
A market area where the transmission capacity between the Market Balance Areas is given to the Balance Responsible Parties in a price based process separated from trading carried out by a Transmission Capacity Allocator. Trade between Market Balance Areas is carried out on a bilateral or unilateral basis.
The auctioning system between TenneT and RWE Net.
This is a type of Market Area.
